I have been using this mobile for last 20 days. There are lots of good things
and bad things. As per me there is no perfect phone ,but the are good phones  
Good things :  
1\. Display : It has the big display and it is very clear. Simply it is good.  
2\. Cameras : 3 cameras gets lot of options and settings. 16 modes on back cam
and 9 modes on front cam (in EMUI 5)  
3\. Performance : good performance  
4\. UI : very easy to use  
Bad things :  
1\. Display protection : It is very smooth and not gorilla glass  
2.Update : I didn't get any update until now. But when I open amazon SIMPLY
NOTICE the new features on the mobile. When will my mobile get an update? we
don't know.  
************************************************************************************************************************************************************************  
Two days back my mobile fell out of my hands and its top layer of glass is
break. It just fell from a height above 4 feet and its glass broken. The glass
broken all over the screen. I didn't expect that huge breaks on the glass .  
If someone wants to buy this mobile my suggestion is to get a scree protector
for it. By that we can reduce the damage .-

My experience with the phone has been great up to now. I have been using the
phone for more than a month now without any heating or hanging issues at all.
The display is too good with decent sound quality. The Honor UI is also very
user friendly and has many user friendly features to make your phone usage
experience a delight. I hope this phone would stay the same for at least 2
years. All in all great product from HONOR.

Super build quality, good finishing, curved edge, metal body, full screen
display is the USP of this phone. Picture quality is very good. Front and rear
camera works good even in low light. Good phone to buy in this price range.

I like the design aspects. Camera quality is good bt not like a pro.focusing
camera gives correct bokeh quality. The blue color body gives me a different
experience. .charge also long lasting.bt i didnt recieved the new updation of
face unlock and AR feature yet. So im bit unhappy with that.. Phone
performance buildquality and the design is awesome. For this range huwaei can
give the fabulous features that s great. Anyways loves the phone.

Awesome product and I just love this mobile phone.....

Straightforward: a very decent and feature loaded phone. Mia1 only recommend

Better battery, better cameras, equivalent performance. Better SCREEN.

Stylish looks and lightweight, smooth and fast processing speed, great camera

review:
Full view display is amazing. Good back camera. Front camera is above my
expectation. Speaker is loud. No headphones in box 🤪 little irritating while
keeping cell bottom up in pocket since 3.5 mm jack is at the bottom but you
become used to it. Battery gets charged in an hour for average use for entire
day. I got it at 13 after exchange and hdfc offer. At this price range there
is no other brand offering 4 gb 64 gb with this version of processor. Fully
satisfied.

This Product has all the things which a flagship killer does have except fast
charging but in terms of Battery life it just rocks, Display 18:9 has very
good contrast and pixel ratio, also primary camera is good in comparison to
other mid range dual cam but I can assure you that no midrange phone can have
front camera like 7x does. In terms of processor it is as similar as
Snapdragon 625 so no problem in gaming too. In terms of 13000 budget just go
for it. Its an awesome product.

life lasted a day with videos, games, hangouts and lots of browsing on Mobile
data.

writing this review after using the product for one month ,  
1\. very nice smartphone,  
2\. no heating issues ,  
3\. battery well supported for a one and half day heavy use.

It is a 'fantastic' product. The battery life is really good and last a day
with ordinary usage. The screen is large and the 18:9 aspect ratio with full
hd+ makes it even better. The camera is really good, portrait photo comes
really nice. Kirin is actually a good chip set , the EMUI skin is good. Only
thing is that is the camera had image stabilization and the set would come
with a fast charger it would be so nice. Now I am looking to the next update
of android OREO and face unlock. THANK YOU!!!

Great phone and I must say the best phone in this price range.

Elsewhere this phone is very clean, smooth in its run and very much efficient.

Thanks Amazon and team for timely delivery with magnificent product.. Honor 7X
is cool phone... But again you have some pros and cons which are,  
PROS,  
1.Big and beautiful screen.  
2.stylish look with metallic body.  
3.call clarity pretty good.  
4.battery backup acceptable.  
5\. Price range very much affordable.  
  
CONS,  
1.front and back camera very disappointing.  
2\. Touch on screen somewhat late responsive.  
3.Hydrid sim card slot limits to either 2sim or single sim and SD Card.

Using mobile from last 45 days before Writing this review Worthy mobile for
this amount. Good camera quality,Decent battery backup, no hanging issue while
playing game. Overall good mobile to buy at this price.

The phone is pretty good as compared to the price.  
The camera is also pretty good and the phone works pretty fast for this price.  
The looks and finish of the phone is pretty good and gives a premium look.

Fast charging would have been cherry on the cake.  
  
Nevertheless, Battery backup is decent enough for moderate or heavy users.
Additionally, this can put on charging on 9pm with 40 juice left on Charing
for approx 1hr 45 min to get fully charged.

Cons  
Outdated ui  
Heating problem for continuous usage of 30min for calls  
my phone got hanged twice for the usage of 30 days.  
Average rear camera performance  
Battery drains fast. ( with Jio 4G Network it drain in 10 Hours)  
Slow charging  
rear camera projected outside. we have to use back cover to protect the same.  
  
Pros  
Looks very stylish  
Lighting fast fingerprint sensor  
Front camera is superb  
Screen is good  
Processor is average. ( hangs for heavy usage)

It feels like very luxurious/costly phone. Best for me. Battery saving is
amazing like only 3-4% consuming in hole day with ultra battery saving mode.  
Picture quality best but its ZOOM action is not equal to 10.or phone. But in
low light it gives very clear scan/photo. For Document scan or Computer screen
scan it is best.  
  
Gorrilla glass missing.  
  
Govind Singh

I am very satisfied with Honor 7X. I just moved from Redmi Note 3 to Honor 7X.
The phone is light weight, beautiful screen display, processor fast enough for
commonly used apps. Camera I have not tested enough.

I loved the phone. Its display is very good and battery is also enough for me.
Once fully charged it lasts for a day with heavy video streaming and internet
usage. The most important thing that I loved in this phone is themes. Every
morning i change my theme and its like a new and exciting experience for me. I
loved the phone. Camera is also good. It has pre installed apps like pitu with
basic version for advanced version i installed pitu and its great too. Soooo
happy with the phone. Highly recommend it to everyone.

I post this review after using it for more than a month.The phone is decent
overall.The camera is good for its price range but most of the times the
bhokeh effect is not working and also the selfie at indoor lighting is
average. The battery backup is normal. The phone struggles for a minute when
the notifications pile up when you switch on the mobile data after a long time
other than that it is swift. Even with some backdrops it is still good for its
price.

Well starting from the phone build, it wide n length ratio is low for which

battery, it's quite efficient and not sure about future it's running quite
good now. UI is different and simple somehow. Fingerprint sensor works
properly.  
In my point of view it's actually value for money.

acceptable levels. Battery life is good but not great. Overall good phone for
general users.

receive any headset.  
It does allow you to insert 2 sims but you have to choose either one sim + SD
card or two sim. We can not insert 2 sims + SD card.  
  
Pros:  
Looks amazing. Average Camera. Fingerprint sensor works faster. Lots to
discover yet.  
Overall good product for this price.

The look and feel of this phone is really beautiful, you actually won't feel
the extra burden of a big screen phone. Display quality really good. Processor
is quite fast.  
Not really happy with the secondary rear camera, in normal mode it takes
really good pic, but if you select dual camera mode it won't give you a proper
DOF image output as its been done in software level and not in proper hardware
level.  
Lastly not good for long time usage as the battery is really not that big, can
run for around a day with moderate usage.

Have used it for 2 weeks so far all good...  
Camera is superb ...  
Display owsom....  
Touch response and finger print great...

Good build and screen. Speaker is poor. Battery is good for one day use.
Camera is average.  
  
Update: Reducing a star as it is giving issues in less than a month.
Unfortunately I am out of the return window so will have to visit service
station. ☹️

review:
An excellent phone with a full value for money. The screen is awesome and the
camera quality is also good. Sound quality is also very decent. There is a
very little lag in spite of multiple apps being opened simultaneously.  
Only con is  
The firmware eats away almost 10gb of your total space of 32 GB. Now I uses 2
Sims so , the sim slot being hybrid with memory card, I will be struggling
with space.  
Otherwise a very good phone. Go for it.

Awesome Phone. Very nice Display. PHOTOGRAPHY QUALITY SUPER EXCELLENT. VIDEO
QUALITY SUPERB. CRYSTAL CLEAR CRISP. LIKED THE PHONE. TOUCH PAD EXCELLENT.
NICE SPEED. VOICE QUALITY NICE. CALL QUALITY VERY CLEAR. TWO SPEAKERS SHOULD
HAVE BEEN THERE. BUT OVERALL SUPERB PHONE. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. THANKS.

Simply go for it it is best phone in this price range

camera gaming performance just decent in all

I wrote this review after using 15 days. This phone is really awesome. Both
front and back cameras quality is superb. No heating issue. Battery is also
awesome. No flickering issue. Design is really cool nd stylish, it's look
really rich in ur hand. All over very nice product. Amazon delivery is also
very fast. Thanks amazon.

This phone doesn't meet my expectation.. I was expecting better camera from
this phone, but I was very disappointed.. I bought this phone as I was not
able to get redmi note 5 Pro and regret my decision.. Moreover, this is not at
all value for money considering the below cons.  
>Only 32 Gb internal storage  
>Only 3340 mAH battery which doesn't even last for one full day with medium
usage  
>Worst camera in this price segment(Both front and back)  
>Phone feels bulky in hand compared to similar 18:9 ratio phones and
definitely not a single hand usage phone  
  
Guys, please do get redmi note 5 Pro or at least redmi note 5 which provides
value for money.. If you buy this phone even after reading this review, you
will definitely regret your decision..

Waste phone. No charging. Very low speed internet. Finger print is not at all

Guys `go for this phone. U will not regret this.

Overall its a very good phone at this price point  
Pros.  
1.Awsmm build quality  
2\. 18:9 display feels you are in trend  
3\. Fast and Accurate fingerprint sensor at the back  
4\. Day light photography is very good plus portrait mode.  
5\. Battery stays a long gives u 1.5 day with normal usage. Nd 1 day with
heavy usage.  
  
Cons.  
1\. Speaker quality is not upto the mark.  
2\. Even though its Full hd 1080p display you will notice some pixels in video
while watching youtube  
3\. No fast charging, takes around 3 to 3.5 hrs to fullcharge.  
4\. Low light photography sucks.  
5\. Not for heavy games
